greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Characteristic function for A265334: a(n) = 1 if n >= k! but < 2*k! for some k, 0 otherwise.
comment: a(n) = 1 if the initial digit in factorial base representation (A007623) of n is 1, 0 otherwise.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10080
Index entries for sequences related to factorial base representation
program: (define (A265333 n) (if (zero? n) n (let loop ((f 1) (i 2)) (let ((nextf (* i f))) (if (> nextf n) (if (< n (* 2 f)) 1 0) (loop nextf (+ 1 i)))))))
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 25 2015
